about.title: Revolutionizing Energy Management with AI
about.description1: Keico Plus is at the forefront of smart energy solutions, combining cutting-edge AI technology with IoT connectivity to help businesses and organizations optimize their energy consumption.
about.description2: Our platform provides real-time insights, automated controls, and predictive analytics that empower you to make smarter energy decisions while reducing costs and environmental impact.

solution1.title: Cost Efficiency
solution1.description: Achieve energy cost reduction and revenue generation through Demand Response, reducing operational burden while maximizing efficiency.

solution2.title: ESG Leadership
solution2.description: Strengthen global ESG assessment responsiveness through transparent carbon emission data management and sustainability reporting.

solution3.title: Digital Transformation
solution3.description: Digital innovation in building management through 3D metaverse control and AI-powered automation for operational excellence.

services.title: Comprehensive Energy Solutions
services.description: Discover our suite of AI-powered tools designed to optimize your energy consumption and reduce operational costs.

service1.title: AI-Powered Analytics
service1.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyze your energy patterns to identify optimization opportunities and predict future consumption.

service2.title: Real-Time Monitoring
service2.description: Monitor your entire energy infrastructure in real-time with intuitive dashboards and instant alerts for anomalies.

service3.title: Smart Device Control
service3.description: Seamlessly integrate and control all your IoT devices from a single platform with automated scheduling and optimization.

service4.title: Energy Optimization
service4.description: Automatically optimize energy usage across your facilities with AI-driven recommendations and automated controls.

service5.title: Predictive Maintenance
service5.description: Prevent equipment failures and reduce downtime with AI-powered predictive maintenance alerts and insights.

howItWorks.title: Simple Steps to Smart Energy
howItWorks.description: Get started with Keico Plus in four easy steps and begin your journey to smarter, more efficient energy management.

step1.title: Connect Devices
step1.description: Easily integrate your IoT sensors and smart devices with our platform.

step2.title: Monitor Usage
step2.description: Track energy consumption in real-time across all connected systems.

step3.title: AI Analysis
step3.description: Our AI analyzes patterns and identifies optimization opportunities.

step4.title: Save Energy
step4.description: Implement recommendations and watch your energy costs decrease.

stats.title: Numbers That Speak
stats.description: See the real-world impact of our energy management solutions across industries worldwide.

caseStudies.title: Success Stories
caseStudies.description: Discover how leading organizations have transformed their energy management with Keico Plus.

case1.title: Smart Office Building Reduces Energy by 40%
case1.description: A 50-story office complex in Seoul implemented Keico Plus to optimize HVAC and lighting systems, achieving significant cost savings.

case2.title: Manufacturing Plant Achieves Net Zero
case2.description: Leading electronics manufacturer integrated IoT sensors across production lines to monitor and optimize energy consumption.

case3.title: Smart City Initiative Powers 10,000 Homes
case3.description: Municipal government deployed Keico Plus across residential areas to create an intelligent energy grid with real-time optimization.

cta.description: Join hundreds of businesses already saving energy and reducing costs with Keico Plus. Schedule a demo today and see the difference.

footer.description: AI-powered IoT energy management platform helping businesses reduce costs and environmental impact through intelligent automation.

hero.title: About KEICO PLUS
hero.subtitle: Smart Energy Solutions for a Sustainable Future

mainDescription.title: Carbon Neutrality, ESG Era
mainDescription.highlight: Korea Energy Industry nurtures future industries based on 4th industrial revolution technology and realizes customer value.
mainDescription.paragraph1: Overcoming the climate crisis is an important common task that all mankind must work together to solve, and the International Energy Agency (IEA) rates 'energy efficiency' as having the highest contribution. Now, mankind is facing the digital transformation era and must more actively improve energy demand efficiency and reduce energy costs.
mainDescription.paragraph2: Korea Energy Industry has been devoted to research and development for a long time to be at the center of solving these challenges of the times, and as a result, we operate a total solution that reflects the environment of each consumer, comprehensively collects and analyzes information on the purpose and characteristics of operating devices, power data, etc., and optimizes energy consumption.
mainDescription.paragraph3: In addition, our energy efficiency platform reflects not only the power consumption and standby power of electrical energy, but also the user's environment, device-specific characteristics, and operation patterns in real time to optimize energy, and contributes to reducing energy consumption costs and stabilizing national power supply and demand through strategic reduction and adjustment of power demand and load leveling.
mainDescription.highlightBox: In the future, Korea Energy Industry Co., Ltd. promises to do its best to lead energy demand efficiency based on 4th industrial revolution technology and become a leader in new growth industries with new future technologies leading carbon neutrality.

businessAreas.title: Main Business Areas
businessAreas.description: KEICO PLUS provides comprehensive solutions for energy efficiency and eco-friendly energy transition

zeb.title: ZEB Business
zeb.description: Zero Energy Building (ZEB) is a building where the sum of energy consumed and produced in the building is zero. KEICO PLUS implements energy self-sufficient buildings through high-efficiency insulation, airtight construction, and renewable energy facilities.

re100.title: RE 100 Business
re100.description: RE100 is a global campaign in which companies commit to using 100% of their electricity from renewable energy. KEICO PLUS supports companies in achieving RE100 through renewable energy introduction consulting and PPA contract support such as solar and wind power.

greenEnergy.title: Green Energy Business
greenEnergy.description: We provide one-stop solutions from solar power system design, construction, to maintenance. We support eco-friendly energy transition with various solutions such as Building Integrated Photovoltaic (BIPV), rooftop solar, and agrivoltaic systems.

zeb.title: Zero Energy Building (ZEB)
zeb.subtitle: Buildings where the sum of energy consumed and energy produced equals zero

description.title: ZEB 3 Elements and FECO's Core Role
description.paragraph: Zero Energy Building is completed by the harmony of three core elements. FECO is responsible for the operation of high-efficiency facilities among them, and supports securing energy independence through AI technology.

card1.title: Building Basic Elements
card1.description: Securing performance to minimize energy loss based on basic architectural elements

card2.title: AI-Optimized Facility Operation
card2.description: Minimizing energy consumption through AI-optimized operation and automatic control of heating, cooling, ventilation, and lighting facilities

card3.title: Renewable Energy Monitoring
card3.description: Support for calculating self-sufficiency rate through monitoring and prediction of renewable energy generation such as solar and geothermal, and data linkage

steps.title: AI-based Energy Consumption Minimization
steps.subtitle: Precisely control facility operations with sensor data to reduce waste and achieve the efficiency grades required for ZEB certification.

item1.title: Real-time Sensor Data Collection and Analysis
item1.description: Collect and analyze data in real time through sensors connected to each facility.

item2.title: Learning Optimal Operating Patterns by Facility
item2.description: AI learns the optimal operating pattern for each facility based on the collected data.

item3.title: Automated Energy-Saving Control
item3.description: Execute automated control based on learned patterns to minimize energy consumption.

bems.eyebrow: AI-driven solution to simplify ZEB certification and energy management innovation
bems.title: Integrated BEMS-level control data
bems.subtitle: Provides integrated control, real-time data logging, and reporting essential for ZEB certification via FECO. Automates complex data aggregation and analysis to accelerate certification.

items.item1: Unified ENMS functions essential for ZEB certification
items.item2: Real-time data control, logging, and reporting support
items.item3: Automated, analysis-based optimization of certification steps

quotes.title: Precise Energy Self-Sufficiency
quotes.subtitle: Compare generation and consumption in real time, calculate self-sufficiency, and present strategies to close the gap.

items.item1: Real-time matching of generation and consumption

sustainable.title: The Path to a Sustainable Future
sustainable.subtitle: Pathway to building a sustainable future
sustainable.description: By optimizing energy consumption and maximizing the value of buildings while contributing to environmental protection, we exert positive influence and work towards realizing a sustainable future.

section1.title: Real-time Energy Monitoring
section1.description: We utilize AI to monitor energy usage in real-time, enabling us to accurately understand energy consumption patterns and recommend optimal usage patterns for achieving energy efficiency.

section2.title: Big Data Analysis-based Energy Optimization
section2.description: Our system operates based on big data analysis to optimize energy usage. Through trends and predictive analysis of energy usage, we propose and implement energy-saving measures.

section3.title: Renewable Energy Production
section3.description: NX builds and manages communities for renewable energy production, connecting individual producers and consumers to foster a sustainable energy ecosystem through smart grids.

section4.title: Power Supply and Trading Utilizing Energy Storage Systems (ESS)
section4.description: Through energy storage systems (ESS), NX plays an efficient role in power supply and participates in the power trading market. This helps balance energy supply and demand and builds a more efficient energy ecosystem.

feco.titleEn: FECO: AI Platform Opening the Future of Green Energy
feco.descriptionEn: KEICO+ deploys a comprehensive green energy business that goes beyond building energy efficiency through the AI-based FECO platform, promoting renewable energy use and contributing to power grid stabilization.
feco.descriptionEn2: FECO is an integrated solution that simultaneously implements building energy Efficiency, Independence, and Flexibility through AI prediction and precision control.

certification.description: KEICO automatically collects and manages energy usage data and calculation standards required for ZEB and K-RE100 certification, generating reports that can be directly used for certification review without complex calculations and documentation.

bemsControl.description: KEICO+ provides a BEMS-level integrated control environment to support viewing the operational status of each facility and energy flow at a glance.

mission.title: Mission
mission.mainText: We lead towards a brighter future through positive impact.
mission.description: We go beyond the conventional energy paradigm to innovate the world's energy, illuminating brightness and hope everywhere. This innovative change lays the foundation for individuals and communities to lead better lives, preserve the environment, and achieve economic prosperity.
items: Creation of new concept value for customers
Improvement of customer quality of life and contribution to public interest
Formation of a smart business system
Realization of the ideology of Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: New Energy Experience - We transcend conventional energy usage methods, ushering in a new era of energy experience for individuals and society.
items: Company contributing to social value creation and future business
Company leading change with challenge and passion

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: These are the principles and standards that all members of KEICO PLUS pursue to achieve our mission and vision.

values.title: Creativity
values.subtitle: 創意
values.description: Think innovatively to change paradigms. We strive for continuous innovation, constantly seeking new ideas and solutions beyond traditional thinking.

values.title: Innovation
values.subtitle: 革新
values.description: Create new value by shedding old practices. Innovation is akin to 'putting on new skin.' We discard outdated customs and methods, embracing creative thinking and technology to don the skin of new possibilities.

values.title: Responsibility
values.subtitle: 責任
values.description: Put heart into every decision and action. Responsibility is our commitment to every action and decision. From the beginning to the completion of every project, we take responsibility for the process and results.

values.title: Respect
values.subtitle: 尊重
values.description: Accept and respect each other's differences. Respect leads our work through accepting each other's differences and showing deep reverence for colleagues, customers, and the world.

values.title: Sustainability
values.subtitle: 지속가능성
values.description: Low-carbon, eco-friendly innovative technology. Expansion of climate technology investment and smart energy cooperation system to contribute to building a carbon-neutral circular society.
